remarks: The sum of a real number modulo a positive real number and another real number equals the sum of the two real numbers modulo the positive real number.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-May-2018.)
statement: modadd2mod $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( B + ( A mod M ) ) mod M ) = ( ( B + A ) mod M ) ) $.
